title: Twenty Funny Stories, Book 1
description: From a simple smile to hysterical laughter, that is what this book sets out to give you The author draws on various family, friends (or no longer friends), and situations to tickle your funny bone. These stories are guaranteed to brighten your day with laughter.With all the sad things going on in the world, we need humor to bring enjoyment to our daily living. Sure, the author is insane, but she is also very funny.
author: Margaret Radisich Sleasman
